description:
Who are we?

With over 20 years of experience, our global network of passionate technologists and pioneering craftsmen deliver cutting-edge technology and game-changing consulting to companies on the brink of transformation. Since 2001, we have grown from a Java company into a full-service digital consulting company with 4500+ professionals working on a worldwide ambition.

We are organized in complementary chapters – teams with a tremendous amount of knowledge and experience within a particular field, such as Agile, DevOps, Data and AI, Cloud, Software Technology, Functional Programming, Low Code, and Microsoft.

Job Title: Sr. Sales Manager (Data/AI)

Location: Remote, USA

About the role

We are seeking a highly motivated Senior Sales Manager with a proven track record in Data/AI solution selling in the services industry to join our team. As the Senior Sales Executive, you will be responsible for developing new business opportunities and driving revenue growth within Xebia’s Data/AI service line.

Xebia is actively looking for Data/AI sellers who have 12+ years of experience with ambitions to develop a 3x to 5x sales funnel in the North American region and convert that into revenue by opening net new, greenfield logos as well as mining the existing install base of Xebia for cross-sell opportunities.

Responsibilities

We are looking for an exceptional Sales leader with strong knowledge in the Data/AI space delivering data/AI solutions to enterprise customers:
• Acquire new customers in the Data/AI space across North America
• Experience in working with partner ecosystem driving business together via co-sell and sourced revenue
• Working on partner activities such as lunch and learns to sales organizations on both the partner side and Xebia side, co-marketing activities such as blogs, webinars, conferences, customer round tables, joint pipeline review, new pipeline creation
• Use knowledge of the Data/AI industry, technology, processes, and consultative sales skills to assess and educate clients on the value of our business and implementation expertise
• Build long-term relationships with key contacts at target customers
• Maximize existing relationships by engaging clients as their primary touchpoint
• Utilize strategic client hunting practices, industry/market analysis, internal communication, external promotions, and constant in-depth client analysis to uncover revenue opportunities.
• Develop and perform strategic prospecting activities to generate pipeline and grow territory
• Build, Manage, and accurately forecast a strong sales pipeline and revenue
• Customer profiling, and account planning against set revenue/margin targets by services line at the account level.
• Anchor client meetings and pursue opportunities generated with the help of pre-sales, delivery, and external partners.
• Build in-depth knowledge of clients' business priorities, challenges, and initiatives that can be translated into opportunities.
• Willingness to work with a geographically distributed team structure in an extremely fast-paced and challenging environment.
• Understand and respond to clients’ business issues by developing a go-forward roadmap
• Has experience in driving and managing large deals.
• Continuously learn about Xebia’s offerings, successes, and business ecosystem to share and bring insights to clients.
• Using CRM effectively to track opportunities and sales forecasts in a weekly, monthly, quarterly, and annual planning rhythm for your region with high levels of predictability, quality, and accuracy

Qualifications
• 12+ years of experience in software services selling to enterprise accounts, 6+ years experience in selling Data/AI solutions to business and technology stakeholders, understanding of BFSI and Retail verticals is a plus
• Demonstrable experience in working with partners such as Snowflake and Databricks
• Demonstrable experience in achieving annual revenue targets, primarily on net new logos
• Highly referenceable previous/current customers
• Experience with the global delivery model, particularly in outsourcing and transformation
• Ability to manage in a complex matrix environment and should be strong and focused on Customer Service excellence
• Excellent Relationship Building Skills
• Excellent communication skills, both oral and written
• Large deal sales experience with the global delivery model, particularly in outsourcing and transformation.
• Technology background in IT consulting/services or Software Engineering services company understands details of the latest Data/AI technology stack including how the landscape has evolved
• Proven ability to land and expand in the acquired customer base, with methodical
• Account planning, and mapping with an approach to build and nurture client relationships.
• Strong solution-selling background
• Legitimate and proven self-starter. Highly motivated to jump in and get things done
• Excellent leadership and communications skills required. High comfort level working with all levels of an organization, including C-suite

Benefits
• Medical, Dental and Vision Insurance (Subsidized)
• Health Savings Account
• Flexible Spending Accounts (Healthcare and Dependent Care)
• Short-Term and Long-Term Disability
• Life and AD&D Insurance
• Assistance Program
• Unlimited access to LinkedIn learning solutions
• Matched 401(k) Retirement Savings Plan
• Paid Time Off

Xebia is committed to creating an inclusive and diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

Please feel free to share your preferred pronouns with us during the application process.

Xebia does not sponsor work visas, either at the time of hire or at any later time. All persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States, and to complete any required employment eligibility forms.
